title: VLM-R3L
description: Vision-Language Models for automated RL reward generation across tasks and environments.
highlights: Evaluated on 4 environments and 10 tasks (+90% gain over prior methods).

title: The Puppet / Puppet AI
description: 2D action/adventure/puzzle game with an RL agent trained for in-game puzzles and parkour challenges.
highlights: Best Visual Design Award (Honorable Mention) in 2023 Creative Game Design Competition.

title: You Ken-Do It
description: VR kendo training game emphasizing realistic combat and counter mechanics.
highlights: Honorable Mention in the League of VR Courses Final Exhibition (3 universities).

title: Musical Interactive LED Cube (FPGA)
description: FPGA LED cube with real-time visuals that react to sound.
highlights: Third Place and Popularity Award in “Logic Design Laboratory” (43 teams).

title: Room Mapper
description: Embedded autonomous robot car for indoor mapping and visualization.
